mapper.insert: insert into story(story_no, story_title, members_no, story_content, story_date) values((select nvl(max(story_no), 0)+1 from story),#{story_title},#{members_no},#{story_content},#{story_date})
mapper.update: update story set story_title=#{story_title}, story_content=#{story_content} where story_no=#{story_no}
mapper.select: select * from story order by story_no desc
select * from story where story_title like '%'||#{storySearchKeyword}||'%' order by story_no desc
select * from story where story_content like '%'||#{storySearchKeyword}||'%' order by story_no desc
